title: What are some real data entry job sites? - Quora

response.answer_text: Try freelancer,appen. Guru, upwork. People per hour, fiver, golance, clickworker, good luck.

I don't think so, most of them ask for money while signing up(which sounds to me like scam).  Anyways, no one will pay money to someone just to do something which can be automated easily using the most basic technologies. :)
